questions.QuestionText: You execute this command: Sufficient storage is available in filesystem /u01. Which two statements are true about the BIG_TBS tablespace? (Choose two)

Options.label: A
Options.text: AUTOEXTEND is possible for the datafile

Options.label: B
Options.text: It must be bigger than the largest SMALLFILE tablespace

Options.label: C
Options.text: Additional data files may not be added

Options.label: D
Options.text: It will be a dictionary-managed tablespace by default

Options.label: E
Options.text: It will always have a 32K block size

questions.Explanation: 1.单文件：只能有一个数据文件。 2.可大：单文件可以非常大（TB 级别）。 3.可扩展：支持 AUTOEXTEND。 4.默认 LMT：locally managed tablespace，而不是 dictionary-managed。 5.块大小可选：不是固定 32K。

questions.QuestionText: Which statement is true about the INTERSECT operator used in compound queries?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Multiple INTERSECT operators are not possible in the same SQL statement

Options.label: B
Options.text: It processes NULLs in the selected columns

Options.label: C
Options.text: INTERSECT is of lower precedence than UNION or UNION ALL

Options.label: D
Options.text: It ignores NULLs

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about advanced connection options supported by Oracle Net for connection to Oracle Database instances? (Choose three)

Options.label: A
Options.text: Connect Time Failover requires the use of Transparent Application Failover (TAF)

Options.label: B
Options.text: Source Routing requires the use of a name server

Options.label: C
Options.text: Source Routing enables the use of Connection Manager (CMAN) which enables network traffic to be routed through a firewall

Options.label: D
Options.text: Load Balancing can balance the number of connections to dispatchers when using a Shared Server configuration

Options.label: E
Options.text: Load Balancing requires the use of a name server

Options.label: F
Options.text: Connect Time Failover requires the connect string to have two or more listener addresses configured

questions.Explanation: Connect-Time Failover 当客户端尝试连接时，如果第一个监听器（Listener）或主机不可用，Oracle Net 会自动尝试下一个地址。也就是在“连接阶段”发生故障切换。只在连接时生效（不是运行时）。不需要 Transparent Application Failover（TAF）。必须在连接字符串中配置两个或以上的 listener 地址。TAF 是一种运行时故障切换机制，当数据库连接中断时，客户端会自动尝试重连到另一节点或实例。由服务器端或客户端配置。可在重连后重新执行查询（SELECT）。常用于 RAC（Real Application Cluster）环境中。Load Balancing 在多个可用的数据库监听器或实例之间，Oracle 可以自动分配客户端连接，以平衡负载。Client-side Load Balancing 客户端随机选择一个监听地址连接。Server-side Load Balancing 由监听器根据当前负载把连接分配给最空闲的实例或 dispatcher，不需要 Name Server，IP 地址即可。通常与 Connect-Time Failover 一起使用。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about date/time functions in a session where NLS_DATE_FORMAT is set to DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS? (Choose two)

Options.label: A
Options.text: CURRENT_TIMESTAMP returns the same date and time as SYSDATE with additional details of fractional seconds

Options.label: B
Options.text: SYSDATE can be queried only from the DUAL table

Options.label: C
Options.text: CURRENT_DATE returns the current date and time as per the session time zone

Options.label: D
Options.text: SYSDATE can be used in expressions only if the default date format is DD-MON-RR

Options.label: E
Options.text: SYSDATE and CURRENT_DATE return the current date and time set for the operating system of the database server

Options.label: F
Options.text: CURRENT_TIMESTAMP returns the same date as CURRENT_DATE

questions.Explanation: 1.服务器时间：用 SYS 开头的函数（SYSDATE、SYSTIMESTAMP） 2.会话时区时间：用 CURRENT_ 或 LOCAL 开头的函数 3.是否有小数秒：只有 TIMESTAMP 才有小数秒 4.是否带时区：只有 WITH TIME ZONE 的类型才带时区 5.格式显示：NLS_DATE_FORMAT 只影响显示，不影响计算 6.CURRENT_DATE vs SYSDATE：前者用会话时区，后者用服务器时区 7.CURRENT_TIMESTAMP vs CURRENT_DATE：日期部分相同，只是一个有小数秒和时区信息

questions.QuestionText: A database is configured to use automatic undo management with temporary undo enabled. An UPDATE is executed on a temporary table. Where is the UNDO stored?

Options.label: A
Options.text: in the undo tablespace

Options.label: B
Options.text: in the SYSAUX tablespace

Options.label: C
Options.text: in the SGA

Options.label: D
Options.text: in the PGA

Options.label: E
Options.text: in the temporary tablespace

questions.QuestionText: You have been tasked to create a table for a banking application. One of the columns must meet three requirements: 1.Be stored in a format supporting date arithmetic without using conversion functions. 2.Store a loan period of up to 10 years 3.Be used for calculating interest for the number of days the loan remains unpaid. Which data type should you use?

Options.label: A
Options.text: INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH

Options.label: B
Options.text: INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND

Options.label: C
Options.text: TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIMEZONE

Options.label: D
Options.text: TIMESTAMP

Options.label: E
Options.text: TIMESTAMP WITH TIMEZONE

questions.QuestionText: In the spfile of a single instance database, LOCAL_LISTENER is set to LISTENER_1. The TNSNAMES.ORA file in $ORACLE_HOME/network/admin in the database home contains:

Options.label: A
Options.text: Dynamic service registration cannot be used for this database instance

Options.label: B
Options.text: The LREG process registers services dynamically with the LISTENER_1 listener

Options.label: C
Options.text: LISTENER_1 must also be defined in the LISTENER.ORA file to enable dynamic service registration

Options.label: D
Options.text: There are two listeners named LISTENER and LISTENER_1 running simultaneously using port 1521 on the same host as the database instances

Options.label: E
Options.text: The definition for LISTENER_1 requires a CONNECT_DATA section to enable dynamic service Registration

questions.Explanation: 1.监听器 ≠ 数据库实例 2.PMON+LREG 自动注册数据库服务到监听器 3.LOCAL_LISTENER 控制注册到哪个监听器 4.TNSNAMES.ORA 仅是名字解析，帮助 PMON 或客户端找到监听器地址 5.LISTENER.ORA 配置监听器自身（端口、协议）

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true concerning logical and physical database structures? (Choose three)

Options.label: A
Options.text: All tablespaces may have one or more data files

Options.label: B
Options.text: The extents of a segment must always reside in the same datafile

Options.label: C
Options.text: A smallfile tablespace might be bigger than a bigfile tablespace

Options.label: D
Options.text: A segment can span multiple data files in some tablespaces

Options.label: E
Options.text: A segments blocks can be of different sizes

Options.label: F
Options.text: A segment might have only one extent

Options.label: G
Options.text: Segments can span multiple tablespsaces

questions.Explanation: 1.每个 datafile 只属于一个 tablespace。tablespace可以有多个 datafile（smallfile）或只有一个（bigfile） 2.一个 Segment 可以跨多个 datafile（多个 extent 分布在不同文件） 3.一个 Extent 必须在同一个 datafile 中 4.一个 Block 是最小单元8kb

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true regarding a SAVEPOINT? (Choose two)

Options.label: A
Options.text: Rolling back to a SAVEPOINT can undo a CREATE INDEX statement

Options.label: B
Options.text: Rolling back to a SAVEPOINT can undo a TRUNCATE statement

Options.label: C
Options.text: Only one SAVEPOINT may be issued in a transaction

Options.label: D
Options.text: A SAVEPOINT does not issue a COMMIT

Options.label: E
Options.text: Rolling back to a SAVEPOINT can undo a DELETE statement

questions.Explanation: 1.ROLLBACK TO savepoint 之后，事务仍然继续，你可以继续做修改、再创建 savepoint 或 COMMIT。 2.COMMIT 会清除所有 savepoints。 3.CREATE INDEX、TRUNCATE 等是 DDL 并且通常会引起隐式 COMMIT，一旦执行了这些语句，ROLLBACK TO savepoint 不能撤销它们。

questions.QuestionText: Which three functions are performed by dispatchers in a shared server configuration? (Choose three)

Options.label: A
Options.text: writing inbound request to the common request queue from all shared server connections

Options.label: B
Options.text: checking for outbound shared server responses on the common outbound response queue

Options.label: C
Options.text: receiving inbound requests from processes using shared server connections

Options.label: D
Options.text: sending each connection input request to the appropriate shared server input queue

Options.label: E
Options.text: broadcasting shared server session responses back to requesters on all connections

Options.label: F
Options.text: sending shared server session responses back to requesters on the appropriate connection

questions.Explanation: 1.Dispatcher：客户端请求入口 → 写入 CRQ → 从 Response Queue 取结果 → 发回客户端。 2.Shared Server：从 CRQ 获取请求 → 执行 SQL → 写入 Response Queue。 3.Queues：CRQ 是共享请求队列，Response Queue 每个会话有独立队列。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the SET VERIFY ON command? (Choose two)

Options.label: A
Options.text: It can be used only in SQL*Plus

Options.label: B
Options.text: It displays values for variables used only in the WHERE clause of a query

Options.label: C
Options.text: It can be used in SQL Developer and SQL*Plus

Options.label: D
Options.text: It displays values for variables created by the DEFINE command

Options.label: E
Options.text: It displays values for variables prefixed with &&

questions.Explanation: 1.SET VERIFY 开 → 打开显示变量替换前后的 SQL。 2.SQL old new 显 → 显示 old（替换前）和 new（替换后）SQL。 3.& 每次问 → &var 每次使用都会提示输入。 4.&& 首次存 → &&var 第一次输入后保存，后续不再提示。 5.DEFINE 定值全显示 → DEFINE var = 值 创建的变量也会显示替换结果。

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about a self-join? (Choose three)

Options.label: A
Options.text: The ON clause must be used

Options.label: B
Options.text: The query must use two different aliases for the table

Options.label: C
Options.text: It must be an equi join

Options.label: D
Options.text: It must be an inner join

Options.label: E
Options.text: The ON clause can be used

Options.label: F
Options.text: It can be an outer join

questions.Explanation: 1.自连接（Self-Join）是让同一张表与自己进行连接，用于比较、匹配、查找同表中不同行之间的关系。通常用于层级关系（员工-经理）、行间比较（工资高低）等 2.必须给同一张表取不同的别名，否则 SQL 无法区分两份数据来源。FROM employees e JOIN employees m ... 3.自连接可以是 INNER JOIN 或 OUTER JOIN，不局限于某一种。比如 LEFT JOIN 用来保留没有上级的员工（如 CEO） 4.自连接的连接条件既可以是 等值连接（equi join），也可以是 非等值连接（non-equi join）。例如 e1.salary > e2.salary 也是自连接 5.ON 子句是可选的，常见于显式 JOIN 语法中，但旧式语法也可以用 WHERE。

questions.QuestionText: You want to write a query that prompts for two column names and the WHERE condition each time it is executed in a session but only prompts for the table name the first time it is executed. The variables used in your query are never undefined in your session. Which query can be used?

Options.label: A
Options.text: SELECT &&col1, &&col2 FROM &table WHERE &&condition = &&cond;

Options.label: B
Options.text: SELECT &col1, &col2 FROM &&table WHERE &condition;

Options.label: C
Options.text: SELECT &col1, &col2 FROM '&table' WHERE &condition;

Options.label: D
Options.text: SELECT '&&col1', '&&col2' FROM &table WHERE '&&condition' = '&cond';

Options.label: E
Options.text: SELECT &&col1, &&col2 FROM &table WHERE &&condition;

questions.QuestionText: Examine the description of the CUSTOMERS table: You want to display details of all customers who reside in cities starting with the letter D followed by at least two characters. Which query can be used?

Options.label: A
Options.text: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city LIKE 'D_%';

Options.label: B
Options.text: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city = '%D_';

Options.label: C
Options.text: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city LIKE 'D_';

Options.label: D
Options.text: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city = 'D_%';

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true? (Choose two)

Options.label: A
Options.text: DML may be performed on tables with one or more extents in this data file during the execution of this command.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The tablespace containing SALES1.DBF must be altered READ ONLY before executing the command.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The tablespace containing SALES1.DBF must be altered OFFLINE before executing the command.

Options.label: D
Options.text: If Oracle Managed Files (OMF) is used, then the file is renamed but moved to DB_CREATE_FILE_DEST.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The file is renamed and stored in the same location

questions.Explanation: Oracle支持在线移动数据文件，这里的在线，意味着不用设置表空间为只读，也不影响数据文件里的表的DML语句，所以A对BC错；reuse参数表明重用原来的数据文件，只是改了名字。所以E对D错。

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about dropping and unused columns in an Oracle database?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A primary key column referenced by another column as a foreign key can be dropped if using the CASCADE option.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A DROP COLUMN command can be rolled back

Options.label: C
Options.text: An UNUSED column's space is reclaimed automatically when the block containing that column is next queried

Options.label: D
Options.text: An UNUSED column's space is reclaimed automatically when the row containing that column is next queried.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Partition key columns cannot be dropped.

Options.label: F
Options.text: A column that is set to UNUSED still counts towards the limit of 1000 columns per table.

questions.Explanation: 1.DROP COLUMN（删除列）真正从表中删除列，包括数据和元数据。是 DDL 操作，会自动提交，不能回滚。可以使用 CASCADE CONSTRAINT,分区键列（Partition Key）不能删除。 2.SET UNUSED（标记列为 UNUSED）将列标记为 UNUSED，使列名不可见，但数据仍在表中。快速，不需要重写整个表。数据仍占用空间。UNUSED 列仍计入表的最大列数（1000 列/表）。不会立即释放空间可以通过 ALTER TABLE DROP UNUSED COLUMNS 真正删除列并释放空间。

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about using an invisible column in the PRODUCTS table?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The %ROWTYPE attribute declarations in PL/SQL to access a row will not display the invisible column in the output.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The DESCRIBE commands in SQL*Plus will not display the invisible column in the output.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Referential integrity constraint cannot be set on the invisible column.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The invisible column cannot be made visible and can only be marked as unused.

Options.label: E
Options.text: A primary key constraint can be added on the invisible column.

questions.QuestionText: ALTER TABLE orders SET UNUSED (order_date);Which statement is true?

Options.label: A
Options.text: After executing the ALTER TABLE command, you can add a new column called ORDER_DATE to the ORDERS table.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The ORDER_DATE column should be empty for the ALTER TABLE command to execute successfully.

Options.label: C
Options.text: ROLLBACK can be used to get back the ORDER_DATE column in the ORDERS table.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The DESCRIBE command would still display the ORDER_DATE column.

questions.QuestionText: ALTER TABLE hr.emp SET UNUSED (mgr_id); Which statement is true regarding the effect of the above SQL statement?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Any views created on the EMP table that include the MGR_ID column would be automatically modified and remain valid.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Any constraints defined on the MGR_ID column would be removed by the above command.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Any synonym existing on the EMP table would have to be re-created.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Any index created on the MGR_ID column would continue to exist until the DROP UNUSED COLUMNS command is executed.

questions.Explanation: 列一旦被设置为 unused 以后，基于该列的约束、索引都被删除，同时相关的视图被无法访问，但是列的数据需要 drop column 时才会被删除

questions.QuestionText: You execute the following command:SQL> ALTER TABLE departments SET UNUSED (country); Which two statements are true?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A new column, COUNTRY, can be added to the DEPARTMENTS table after executing the command.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Indexes created on the COUNTRY column exist until the DROP UNUSED COLUMNS command is executed.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Unique key constraints defined on the COUNTRY column are removed.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Synonyms existing on the DEPARTMENTS table would have to be re-created.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Views created on the DEPARTMENTS table that include the COUNTRY column are automatically modified and remain valid.

questions.Explanation: 列一旦被设置为 unused 以后，基于该列的约束、索引都被删除，同时相关的视图被无法访问，但是列的数据需要 drop column 时才会被删除

questions.QuestionText: Rows exist in this table with data in all the columns. You put the PRODUCTS table in read-only mode.Which three commands execute successfully on PRODUCTS?

Options.label: A
Options.text: ALTER TABLE products DROP COLUMN expiry_date;

Options.label: B
Options.text: CREATE INDEX price_idx ON products (price);

Options.label: C
Options.text: ALTER TABLE products SET UNUSED (expiry_date);

Options.label: D
Options.text: TRUNCATE TABLE products;

Options.label: E
Options.text: ALTER TABLE products DROP UNUSED COLUMNS;

Options.label: F
Options.text: DROP TABLE products;

questions.Explanation: 当一个表被设置为 READ ONLY 时：1.不允许 DML 操作：INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, TRUNCATE 2.不允许修改表结构：ALTER TABLE ... ADD / DROP / MODIFY COLUMN 3.可以创建或删除索引 4.可以删除整个表（DROP TABLE） 5.可以执行 SELECT

questions.QuestionText: Choose three: Which three are true about dropping columns from a table?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A column can be removed only if it contains no data.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A column drop is implicitly committed.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A column that is referenced by another column in any other table cannot be dropped.

Options.label: D
Options.text: A column must be set as UNUSED before it is dropped from a table.

Options.label: E
Options.text: A primary key column cannot be dropped.

Options.label: F
Options.text: Multiple columns can be dropped simultaneously using the ALTER TABLE command.

questions.Explanation: 所有DDL语句（包括 ALTER TABLE、DROP TABLE、CREATE TABLE 等）在Oracle中都会自动提交（implicitly committed）而且无法回滚（cannot be rolled back），主键解除constraints也可以drop

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true regarding Oracle database space management within blocks managed by Automatic Segment Space Management (ASSM)? (Choose two)

Options.label: A
Options.text: PCTFREE defaults to 10% for all blocks in all segments for all compression methods.

Options.label: B
Options.text: ASSM assigns blocks to one of four fullness categories based on what percentage of the block is allocated for rows.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Update operations always attempt to find blocks with free space appropriate to the length of the row being updated.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Insert operations always attempt to find blocks with free space appropriate to the length of the row being inserted.

Options.label: E
Options.text: A block will always be eligible for inserts if the row is short enough to fit into the block.

questions.Explanation: 1. 自动分配，不用 FREELIST； 2. 仍看 PCTFREE，不用 PCTUSED； 3. 插入找块靠位图； 4. 更新太大迁移行； 5. 压缩表 PCTFREE = 0。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the ORD_ITEMS table and the ORD_SEQ sequence? (Choose two)

Options.label: A
Options.text: If sequence ORD_SEQ is dropped then the default value for column ORD_NO will be NULL for rows inserted into ORD_ITEMS.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Any user inserting rows into table ORD_ITEMS must have been granted access to sequence ORD_SEQ.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Column ORD_NO gets the next number from sequence ORD_SEQ whenever a row is inserted into ORD_ITEMS and no explicit value is given for ORD_NO.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Sequence ORD_SEQ cycles back to 1 after every 5000 numbers and can cycle 20 times.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Sequence ORD_SEQ is guaranteed not to generate duplicate numbers.

questions.Explanation: 1. DEFAULT ord_seq.NEXTVAL 会在插入未赋值时调用 2. 想手动插入，必须有 SELECT 权限才能使用 NEXTVAL 3. 理解循环条件，不会因为 CACHE 而循环，和 maxvalue 有关 4. 删除序列 → 表默认值失效，插入报错，不会显示 null 5. 循环序列可能重复，不能绝对保证唯一

questions.QuestionText: Which three instance situations are possible with the Oracle Database server without multi-tenant?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Two or more instances on separate servers all associated with one database.

Options.label: B
Options.text: One instance on one server associated with one database.

Options.label: C
Options.text: One instance on one server associated with two or more databases on the same server.

Options.label: D
Options.text: One instance on one server not associated with any database.

Options.label: E
Options.text: One instance on one server associated with two or more databases on separate servers.

questions.Explanation: 两个或者多个实例都与同一个数据库关联，适合 RAC 的场景；相对的选项 B 适合单实例的场景；选项 D 适合实例和数据库不关联的场景，配置阶段或挂起阶段。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the ORDER BY clause when used with a SQL statement containing a SET operator such as UNION? (Choose two)

Options.label: A
Options.text: Column positions must be used in the ORDER BY clause.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Only column names from the first SELECT statement in the compound query are recognized.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The first column in the first SELECT of the compound query with the UNION operator is used by default to sort output in the absence of an ORDER BY clause.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Each SELECT statement in the compound query must have its own ORDER BY clause.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Each SELECT statement in the compound query can have its own ORDER BY clause.

questions.Explanation: Using the ORDER BY Clause in Set Operations: 1. The ORDER BY clause can appear only once at the end of the compound query. 2. Component queries cannot have individual ORDER BY clauses. 3. The ORDER BY clause recognizes only the columns of the first SELECT query. 4. By default, the first column of the first SELECT query is used to sort the output in an ascending order

questions.QuestionText: Valuate the following SQL statement: SQL> select cust_id, cust_last_name "Last name" FROM customers WHERE country_id = 10 UNION SELECT cust_id CUST_NO, cust_last_name FROM customers WHERE country_id = 30 Identify three ORDER BY clauses either one of which can complete the query.

Options.label: A
Options.text: ORDER BY 'Last name'

Options.label: B
Options.text: ORDER BY 2, cust_id

Options.label: C
Options.text: ORDER BY CUST_NO

Options.label: D
Options.text: ORDER BY 2, 1

Options.label: E
Options.text: ORDER BY 'CUST_NO'

questions.QuestionText: Which four account management capabilities can be configured using Oracle profiles? (Choose four)

Options.label: A
Options.text: The number of hours for which an account is locked after the configured number of login attempts has been reached.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The number of days for which an account may be inactive before it is locked.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The maximum amount of CPU time allowed for a user's sessions before their account is locked.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The ability to prevent a password from ever being reused.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The number of password changes required within a period of time before a password can be reused.

Options.label: F
Options.text: The number of days for which an account is locked after the configured number of login attempts has been reached.

Options.label: G
Options.text: The maximum number of sessions permitted for a user before the account is locked.

questions.QuestionText: Which statement is true about profiles?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Resource limits specified in a profile assigned to a user are always enabled

Options.label: B
Options.text: A profile can be assigned only to one user

Options.label: C
Options.text: A user can exist without any profile

Options.label: D
Options.text: Password management using profiles is always enabled

questions.Explanation: Resource_limit 是 parameter，不是在 profile 里设置的，所以 A 错；一个 profile 文件可以指定给多个用户，所以 B 错；任何 oracle 用户必然属于某一个 profile，未指定的话则属于 default，所以 C 错。D 是正确的，profile 里密码管理策略总是 enable 的

questions.QuestionText: Which statement is true about the DEFAULT profile?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It can be dropped and recreated

Options.label: B
Options.text: It must be explicitly assigned to a user

Options.label: C
Options.text: The values assigned to the resource limits and password parameters in the default profile can be altered

Options.label: D
Options.text: A different DEFAULT profile can be created for each user in a database

questions.QuestionText: Which three are true about the effects of executing these statements?

Options.label: A
Options.text: User HR is permitted to create more than three concurrent sessions

Options.label: B
Options.text: The password complexity will not be enforced on the HR account

Options.label: C
Options.text: Password complexity checking is enforced for user HR

Options.label: D
Options.text: The HR account will get locked by Oracle after ten consecutive failed login attempts

Options.label: E
Options.text: The HR account will be locked after three consecutive failed login attempts

Options.label: F

questions.QuestionText: A user establishes a connection to a database instance by using an Oracle Net connection. You want to ensure the following: 1. questions.QuestionText: In your database, you want to ensure that idle sessions that are blocking active are automatically terminated after a specified period of time. How would you accomplish this?

questions.Explanation: DBRM ：“阻塞会话 + 活跃资源管理” IDLE_TIME：“单纯空闲时间限制” DLE_TIME 参数是指定超过了该时间不管有没有阻塞别人的会话，请求会话都会被 kill，但是题目的前提是阻塞了别人的会话，所有只有通过资源管理器才能够实现这一要求

questions.QuestionText: The EMPLOYEES table contains columns EMP_ID of data type NUMBER and HIRE_DATE of data type DATE. You want to display the date of the first Monday after the completion of six months since hiring. Options.label: B

questions.QuestionText: Which are three actions any one of which the DBA could take to resume the session?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Add a data file to DATA.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Drop other U1 objects in DATA.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Increase U1's quota sufficiently in DATA.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Set DEFERRED_SEGMENT_CREATION to TRUE.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Grant UNLIMITED TABLESPACE to U1.

Options.label: F
Options.text: Set AUTOEXTEND ON for data files in DATA.

questions.Explanation: 1. A 添加数据文件仅增加表空间总容量，但 U1 的配额仍为 1 MB，无法解决配额不足问题。 2. D 设置 DEFERRED_SEGMENT_CREATION=TRUE 仅对后续操作生效，当前已挂起的操作仍因段已分配而受配额限制。 3. F 启用数据文件自动扩展仅增加表空间总容量，但 U1 的配额未变，无法解决当前配额不足问题。

questions.QuestionText: In which three situations does a new transaction always start?

Options.label: A
Options.text: When issuing a SELECT FOR UPDATE statement after a CREATE TABLE AS SELECT statement was issued in the same session.

Options.label: B
Options.text: When issuing a TRUNCATE statement after a SELECT statement was issued in the same session.

Options.label: C
Options.text: When issuing a CREATE TABLE statement after a SELECT statement was issued in the same session.

Options.label: D
Options.text: When issuing the first Data Manipulation Language (DML) statement after a COMMIT OR ROLLBACK statement was issued in the same session.

Options.label: E
Options.text: When issuing a CREATE INDEX statement after a CREATE TABLE statement completed successfully in the same session.

Options.label: F
Options.text: When issuing a DML statement after a DML statement failed in the same session.

questions.Explanation: 1.DML (INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE/MERGE)自动开始新事务，如果前一个事务结束（COMMIT/ROLLBACK） 2.SELECT不会启动事务 3.SELECT FOR UPDATE会锁行，启动事务 4.DDL (CREATE/ALTER/DROP/TRUNCATE)不算新事务启动，但隐式提交前一个事务DDL 执行会自动 COMMIT 前一个事务 5.DML 失败，事务仍然存在，下一条 DML 在同一事务中

questions.QuestionText: What is the outcome?

questions.QuestionText: Which four statements are true about database instance behavior?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Redo log files can be renamed in mount state.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Datafiles can be renamed in mount state.

Options.label: C
Options.text: All dynamic performance views (v$ views) return data when queried from a session connected to an instance in nomount state.

Options.label: D
Options.text: An spfile can be updated when connected to an idle instance.

Options.label: E

questions.Explanation: 1.NOMOUNT：实例已启动，SGA 分配完成，后台进程启动，但控制文件未挂载，可以修改 spfile- 创建 PFILE/SPFILE- 连接实例执行部分管理命令，不可以访问数据文件- 查询大部分 v$ 视图 2.MOUNT：控制文件挂载，数据文件和 redo log 尚未打开，可以重命名 redo log / 数据文件- 执行恢复操作（recover）- 查询部分 v$ 视图，不可以数据操作（SELECT/INSERT/UPDATE） 3.OPEN：数据库完全打开，可以读写数据- 全部 v$ 视图可用

Options.text: SELECT promo_cost, promo_category FROM promotions ORDER BY 1;

Options.label: B
Options.text: SELECT DISTINCT promo_cost || ' in ' || DISTINCT promo_category FROM promotions ORDER BY 1;

Options.label: C
Options.text: SELECT DISTINCT promo_category || ' has ' || promo_cost AS COSTS FROM promotions ORDER BY 1;

Options.text: SELECT promo_category, DISTINCT promo_cost FROM promotions ORDER BY 2;

Options.label: E
Options.text: SELECT DISTINCT promo_category, promo_cost FROM promotions ORDER BY 1;

questions.Explanation: distinct 只能在 select 子句第一个位置使用，不能有两个 distinct 语句。

questions.QuestionText: Which query would satisfy this requirement?

Options.label: A
Options.text: SELECT DISTINCT promo_category, promo_cost FROM promotions ORDER BY 1

Options.label: B
Options.text: SELECT promo_category, DISTINCT promo_cost FROM promotions

Options.label: C
Options.text: SELECT DISTINCT promo_cost, promo_category FROM promotions

Options.label: D
Options.text: SELECT DISTINCT promo_cost, DISTINCT promo_category FROM promotions;

questions.QuestionText: In the ORCL database, UNDOTBS1 is the active undo tablespace with these properties: 1. A size of 100 MB 2. AUTOEXTEND is off 3. UNDO_RETENTION is set to 15 minutes 4. It has RETENTION GUARANTEE UNDOTBS1 fills with uncommitted undo 10 minutes after the database opens. What will happen when the next update is attempted by any transaction?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It succeeds and the generated undo is stored in SYSTEM

Options.label: B
Options.text: It fails and returns the error message 'ORA-30036: unable to extend segment by 8 in undo tablespace UNDOTBS1'

Options.label: C
Options.text: It succeeds and the least recently written undo block of UNDOTBS1 is overwritten by the generated undo

Options.label: D
Options.text: It succeeds and the generated undo is stored in SYSAUX

Options.label: E
Options.text: It succeeds and the least recently read undo block of UNDOTBS1 is overwritten by the generated undo

questions.Explanation: 1.UNDO 只能在 undo tablespace 2.SYSAUX 用于存储 Oracle 辅助组件的数据 3.系统运行时，如果 undo tablespace 满了，Oracle 不会把 undo 放到 SYSAUX，会报错（如 ORA-30036）。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the rules of precedence for operators?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The concatenation operator || is always evaluated before addition and subtraction in an expression

Options.label: B
Options.text: NULLS influence the precedence of operators in an expression

Options.label: C
Options.text: + binary operator has the highest precedence in an expression in a SQL statement

Options.label: D
Options.text: Arithmetic operators with equal precedence are evaluated from left to right within an expression

Options.label: E
Options.text: Multiple parentheses can be used to override the default precedence of operators in an expression

questions.Explanation: 1. 算术运算符* / 优先级最高+ -其次 2. 字符串连接|| → 低于算术运算符 3. 逻辑运算符NOT → 高于 AND、OR 4. 括号总是最高优先级，可以强制改变计算顺序 5. 同级运算符从左到右依次执行

questions.QuestionText: What must you do so that KING is authenticated by the OS when connecting to the database instance?

Options.label: A

Options.label: B
Options.text: Have the OS administrator add KING to the OSDBA group

Options.label: C
Options.text: Grant DBA to KING

Options.label: D
Options.text: Unset REMOTE_LOGIN_PASSWORD FILE

Options.label: E

questions.QuestionText: What will be the result?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It gives an error because the ALL keyword is not valid

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about trace files produced by the Oracle Database server?

Options.label: A

Options.label: B
Options.text: Trace files are written to the Fast Recovery Area (FRA)

Options.label: C

Options.label: D

Options.label: E

questions.QuestionText: You need to calculate the number of days from 1st January 2019 until today. Dates are stored in the default format of DD-MON-RR. Which two queries give the required output?

Options.label: A
Options.text: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY') -'01-JAN-2019' FROM DUAL;

Options.label: B
Options.text: SELECT ROUND(SYSDATE - '01-JAN-2019') FROM DUAL;

Options.label: C
Options.text: SELECT ROUND(SYSDATE - TO_DATE('01/JANUARY/2019')) FROM DUAL;

Options.label: D
Options.text: SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'DD/MONTH/YYYY') - '01/JANUARY/2019' FROM DUAL;

Options.label: E
Options.text: SELECT SYSDATE - TO_DATE('01-JANUARY-2019') FROM DUAL;

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the DUAL table?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It can be accessed only by the SYS user

Options.label: B
Options.text: It consists of a single row and single column of VARCHAR2 data type

Options.label: C
Options.text: It can display multiple rows but only a single column

Options.label: D
Options.text: It can be used to display only constants or pseudo columns

Options.label: E

Options.label: F

questions.QuestionText: Which query is valid?

Options.label: A
Options.text: SELECT dept_id, AVG(MAX(salary)) FROM employees GROUP BY dept_id;

Options.label: B
Options.text: SELECT dept_id, join_date, SUM(salary) FROM employees GROUP BY dept_id;

Options.label: C
Options.text: SELECT dept_id, join_date, SUM(salary) FROM employees GROUP BY dept_id, join_date;

Options.label: D
Options.text: SELECT dept_id, MAX(AVG(salary)) FROM employees GROUP BY dept_id;

questions.Explanation: SELECT 中出现的列必须在 GROUP BY 中出现，或者被聚合函数包裹。

questions.QuestionText: Which four statements are true regarding primary and foreign key constraints and the effect they can have on table data?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A table can have only one primary key but multiple foreign keys

Options.label: B
Options.text: A table can have only one primary key and foreign key

Options.label: C
Options.text: The foreign key columns and parent table primary key columns must have the same names

Options.label: D
Options.text: It is possible for child rows that have a foreign key to remain in the child table at the time the parent row is deleted

Options.label: E
Options.text: It is possible for child rows that have a foreign key to be deleted automatically from the child table at the time the parent row is deleted

Options.label: F
Options.text: Only the primary key can be defined at the column and table level

Options.label: G
Options.text: Primary key and foreign key constraints can be defined at both the column and table level

questions.QuestionText: What is true about non-equijoin statement performance? (Choose two.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: Table aliases can improve performance

Options.label: B
Options.text: The BETWEEN condition always performs better than using the >= and <= conditions

Options.label: C
Options.text: The join syntax used makes no difference to performance

Options.label: D
Options.text: The BETWEEN condition always performs less well than using the >= and <=conditions

Options.label: E
Options.text: The Oracle join syntax performs better than the SQL:1999 compliant ANSI join syntax

questions.Explanation: 1. 非等值连接本身比等值连接慢，因为索引利用有限。 2. BETWEEN 和 >= AND <= 性能相同。 3. 表别名和语法选择主要是可读性和维护性，不显著影响性能。 4. 性能优化主要依赖：数据量大小，索引的存在与类型，执行计划选择

questions.QuestionText: In your data center, Oracle Managed Files (OMF) is used for all databases. All tablespaces are smallfile tablespaces. SALES_Q1 is a permanent user-defined tablespace in the SALES database. Examine this command which is about to be issued by a DBA logged in to the SALES database: ALTER TABLESPACE sales_q1 ADD DATAFILE; Which are two actions, either one of which you could take to ensure that the command executes successfully?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Ensure that DB_RECOVERY_FILE_DEST and DB_CREATE_FILE_DEST each specify with at least 50 Mb of available space.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Specify a path in the DATAFILE clause of the command specifying a location with at least 100M of available space.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Ensure that DB_CREATE_FILE_DEST specifies a location with at least 100 Mb of available space.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Add the AUTOEXTEND ON clause with NEXT set to 100M.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Ensure that DB_RECOVERY_FILE_DEST and DB_CREATE_FILE_DEST each specify locations with at least 50 Mb of available space.

questions.QuestionText: db_create_file_dest string /u01/app/oracle/oradata/prod/ Now examine this statement CREATE TABLESPACE data_olap; Tablespace is created. Which two are true about this tablespace and its attributes?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The datafile is created with a name generated by the Oracle Instance.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The datafile size is 100M.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The tablespace is created with manual segment space management.

Options.label: D

questions.Explanation: OMF 管理的数据文件，它的名字由 oracle 自动起名；而且默认是 100M，自动扩展

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about Oracle Managed Files (OMF)?

Options.label: A
Options.text: OMF cannot be used in a database that already has data files created with user-specified directions.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The file system directions that are specified by OMF parameters are created automatically.

Options.label: C
Options.text: OMF can be used with ASM disk groups, as well as with raw devices, for better file management.

Options.label: D
Options.text: OMF automatically creates unique file names for tablespaces and control files.

Options.label: E
Options.text: OMF may affect the location of the redo log files and archived log files.

questions.Explanation: 1.OMF 的核心功能之一：自动命名、自动管理数据库文件，减轻 DBA 手动管理 OS 层文件名/路径的负担。 2.Oracle 会在你给出一个已存在的目录（或 ASM 磁盘组）时在其中创建和管理文件，但Oracle 不会自动创建操作系统上的目录

questions.QuestionText: Why does the DB01.abc.com service show unknown status?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The service DB01.abc.com is dynamically registered

Options.label: B
Options.text: The LOCAL_LISTENER database parameter is not set to a service name that refers to LISTENER_1

Options.label: C
Options.text: The service DB01.abc.com is statically registered

Options.label: D
Options.text: The listener is not listening on the default port 1521

Options.label: E
Options.text: The SID_LIST_LISTENER section is not contained in the LISTENER.ORA file

questions.Explanation: 当实例是通过 PMON 动态注册（dynamic registration，又称“动态注册”或“service registration”）到监听器时，监听器通常能看到实例的运行状态并显示为 READY。反之，如果监听器对实例无法获取到 PMON 提供的状态信息（常见于静态注册或动态注册未成功时），它会把状态显示为 UNKNOWN。

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about the tools used to configure Oracle Net Services?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The Oracle Net Configuration Assistant is only used when running the Oracle installer

Options.label: B
Options.text: Oracle Net Manager can be used to centrally configure listeners on any database server target

Options.label: C
Options.text: The lsnrctl utility requires a listener.ora file to exist before it is started

Options.label: D
Options.text: Oracle Net Manager can be used to locally configure naming methods on a database server

Options.label: E
Options.text: Enterprise Manager Cloud Control can be used to centrally configure listeners on any managed database server

Options.label: F
Options.text: Enterprise Manager Cloud Control can be used to centrally configure net service names for any database server target

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true regarding the UNION and UNION ALL operators?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Duplicates are eliminated automatically by the UNION ALL operator

Options.label: B
Options.text: The number of columns selected in each SELECT statement must be identical

Options.label: C
Options.text: The names of columns selected in each SELECT statement must be identical

Options.label: D
Options.text: The output is sorted by the UNION ALL operator

Options.label: E

questions.Explanation: UNION 去重（包括 NULL），列数必须相同；UNION ALL 不去重，不排序，列名不必相同。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the Automatic Diagnostic Repository (ADR)

Options.label: A
Options.text: The ADR base defaults to $ORACLE_HOME/rdbms/admin if neither DIAGNOSTIC_DEST or ORACLE_BASE is set

Options.label: B
Options.text: The ADR base defaults to $ORACLE_HOME/dbs if the DIAGNOSTIC_DEST parameter and the ORACLE_BASE environment variable are not set

Options.label: D
Options.text: It supports diagnostics for Oracle Clusterware

Options.label: E
Options.text: It is held inside an Oracle database schema

questions.Explanation: 1.DIAGNOSTIC_DEST 设置了使用它 2.没设置 DIAGNOSTIC_DEST，但 ORACLE_BASE 设置了$ORACLE_BASE/diag 3.两者都没设置 $ORACLE_HOME/diag

questions.QuestionText: Examine this command: SQL> ALTER SYSTEM SET ENABLE_DDL_LOGGING=TRUE; Which two statements are true?

Options.label: A
Options.text: All DDL statements are logged in to a text file in Automatic Diagnostic Repository (ADR) home.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The Alert Log still contains some DDL statements.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Some data definition language (DDL) statements are written to the control file.

Options.label: D
Options.text: All data definition language (DDL) statements are written to the control file.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Some DDL statements are written to a text file in the ADR home.

Options.label: F
Options.text: Some DDL statements are written to an XML file in the ADR home.

questions.Explanation: 开 DDL 跟踪后，要通过 adrci 命令的 show log 才能够查看 DDL 日志，sys用户的 DDL 语句也会被纪录。adrci> show log ADR Home = /u01/app/oracle/diag/rdbms/orcl/ORCL，在该目录下有个 log 目录，里面有ddl_ORCL.log 文本跟踪日志，同时在 log 目录的 ddl 目录中有 log.xml 日志文件

questions.QuestionText: ALTER SYSTEM SET enable_ddl_logging = TRUE; Which statement is true?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Only the data definition language (DDL) commands that resulted in errors are logged in the alert log file.

Options.label: B
Options.text: All DDL commands are logged in the alert log file.

Options.label: C
Options.text: All DDL commands are logged in a different log file that contains DDL statements and their execution dates.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Only DDL commands that resulted in the creation of new segments are logged.

Options.label: E
Options.text: All DDL commands are logged in XML format in the alert directory under the Automatic Diagnostic Repository (ADR) home.

questions.Explanation: 默认情况下，Oracle 不会记录所有 DDL 到日志中，只有报错或某些特殊情况会记录。1.如果设置为 TRUE：所有 DDL 操作都会被记录到一个日志文件中。2.这个日志文件不是 alert.log，而是 位于ADR（Automatic Diagnostic Repository）中的 DDL 日志文件。3.文件会记录 DDL 语句及执行的时间。

questions.QuestionText: You want to apply the principle of Least Privilege in all your live databases. One of your requirements is to revoke unnecessary privileges from all users who have them using Privilege Analysis. Which three types of analyses can be done using the DBMS_PRIVILEGE_CAPTURE package?

Options.label: A
Options.text: analysis of all privileges used by all users including administrative users in the database

Options.label: B
Options.text: analysis of all privileges used by all users but excluding administrative users in the database

Options.label: C
Options.text: analysis of privileges that a user has on their own schema objects that they did not use

Options.label: D
Options.text: analysis of privileges that a user has on their own schema objects that they did use

Options.label: E
Options.text: analysis of privileges granted directly to a role that are then used by a user who has been granted that role

Options.label: F
Options.text: analysis of privileges granted indirectly to a role that are then used by a user who has been granted that role

questions.Explanation: DBMS_PRIVILEGE_CAPTURE 就像一个门禁监控系统，它能分析普通用户（不含管理员）和角色（直接或间接授予）的权限使用情况，帮助 DBA 确定哪些权限没被用过、可以撤销。

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about undo segments and the use of undo by transactions in an Oracle database instance?

Options.label: A
Options.text: An undo segment may be used by multiple transactions simultaneously

Options.label: B
Options.text: Undo segments can wrap around to the first extent when a transaction fills the last extent of the undo segment

Options.label: C
Options.text: Undo segments have a minimum of three extents

Options.label: D
Options.text: Undo segments can extend when a transaction fills the last extent of the undo segment

Options.label: E
Options.text: A single transaction may use multiple undo segments simultaneously

Options.label: F
Options.text: Undo segments must be stored in a BIGFILE tablespace

Options.label: G
Options.text: Undo segments must be stored in a SMALLFILE tablespace

questions.Explanation: undo 段可被多个事务同时使用；段可以在填满 extent 时回绕到前面的 extent；在需要且可能的情况下段也可以扩展。

questions.QuestionText: What is the effect on new transactions when all undo space in the default undo tablespace is in use by active transactions?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Transactions wait until space becomes available in UNDOTBS1.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Transactions write their undo in a temporary tablespace.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Transactions fail.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Transactions write their undo in the SYSTEM undo segment.

questions.Explanation: 即使系统有多个 undo tablespace，Oracle 在运行时只会使用当前 undo_tablespace 参数指定的那一个；它不会自动切换到别的 undo 表空间；如果默认的 undo tablespace 空间用完又不能扩展，新的事务就会失败。

questions.QuestionText: One of your databases supports an OLTP workload. The default undo tablespace is fixed size with: 1. RETENTION NOGUARANTEE 2. undo_retention is 12 minutes. User scott get this error after a query on the sales table has run for more than 15 minutes: ORA-01555: snapshot too old Which three factors taken separately or in some combination might be the cause?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A committed delete to the sales table was made more than 12 minutes before the query began.

Options.label: B
Options.text: An uncommitted delete to the sales table was made more than 12 minutes before the query began.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A committed update to the sales table was made more than 12 minutes before the query began.

Options.label: D
Options.text: An uncommitted update to the sales table was made more than 12 minutes before the query began.

Options.label: E
Options.text: An update was made to the sales table before the query began.

Options.label: F
Options.text: An update to the SALES table was committed after the query began.

Options.label: G
Options.text: An update was made to the sales table after the query began.

questions.Explanation: 1.未提交（活动）--从不覆盖 2.已提交（未过期） -- 少于保留期 12 分钟 -- 保留 --但不保证 3.旧提交（已过期） --早于保留期 12 分钟 --被新事务覆盖

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about Enterprise Manager Database Express?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It is available only when the database is open

Options.label: B
Options.text: It can be used to perform database recovery

Options.label: C
Options.text: The same port number can be used for Database Express configurations for databases on different hosts

Options.label: D
Options.text: It can be used to switch a database into ARCHIVELOG MODE

Options.label: E

questions.Explanation: 1. EM Express 只管理单个数据库实例。 2. 需要数据库 OPEN 才能访问。 3. 端口号是访问入口，不同主机可以重复，相同主机不能重复。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true?

Options.label: A

Options.text: Employee 200 will have JOB_ID set to the same value as the JOB_ID of employee 100

Options.text: Employees 100 and 200 will have the same SALARY as before the update command

questions.QuestionText: Which two are true about a SQL statement using SET operators such as UNION?

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about time zones, date data types, and timestamp data types in an Oracle database?

Options.text: The SESSIONTIMEZONE function can return an offset from Universal Coordinated Time (UTC)

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about time zones,date data types,and timestamp data types in an oracle database?

Options.text: The DBTIMEZONE function can return an offset from Universal Coordinated Time(UTC).

Options.label: B
Options.text: A TIMESTAMP data type column contains information about year,month,and day.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIMEZONE data type column is stored in the database using the time zone of the session that inserted the row.

Options.text: The CURRENT_TIMESTAMP function returns data without time zone information.

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about CURRENT_TIMESTAMP?

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about inner and outer joins?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A full outer join returns matched and unmatched rows

Options.label: B
Options.text: An inner join returns matched rows

Options.label: C
Options.text: Outer joins can only be used between two tables per query

questions.QuestionText: Which two SQL statements execute successfully?

Options.label: A
Options.text: SELECT customer_id AS “CUSTOMER-ID”, transaction_date AS DATE, amount + 100 “DUES” FROM transactions;

Options.label: B
Options.text: SELECT customer_id AS “CUSTOMER-ID”, transaction_date AS “DATE”, amount +100 DUES FROM transactions;

questions.QuestionText: The CUSTOMERS table has a CUST_CREDIT_LIMIT column of data type NUMBER. Which two queries execute successfully? (Choose two.)

Options.text: SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(cust_credit_limit * .15), 'Not Available') FROM customers;

Options.text: SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(cust_credit_limit * .15, 'Not Available')) FROM customers;

Options.label: E
Options.text: SELECT NVL2(cust_credit_limit, TO_CHAR(cust_credit_limit * .15), 'Not Available') FROM customers;

questions.Explanation: 1.NVL(expr1, expr2)必须两个参数。返回值的数据类型与第一个参数(expr1) 保持一致。数据库会尝试把 expr2 转换成 expr1 的类型(如果类型不同),如果不能转换则报错。2.NVL2(expr1,expr2, expr3) 含义是:如果第一个参数为空,则返回第三个参数;如果第一个参数不为空那么显示第二个参数的值。expr2 与 expr3 的数据类型应该互相兼容（通常都为字符串或都为数字等）。

questions.QuestionText: Which SQL statement would produce the required result?

Options.label: A
Options.text: SELECT NVL (TO_CHAR(cust_credit_limit*.15), ‘Not Available’) “NEW CREDIT” FROM customers

Options.label: B
Options.text: SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(cust_credit_limit*.15), ‘Not Available’)) “NEW CREDIT” FROM customers

Options.label: C
Options.text: SELECT NVL (cust_credit_limit*.15, ‘Not Available’) “NEW CREDIT” FROM customers

Options.label: D
Options.text: SELECT NVL (cust_credit_limit, ‘Not Available’)*.15 “NEW CREDIT” FROM customers

questions.Explanation: NVL(expr1, expr2)必须两个参数。返回值的数据类型与第一个参数(expr1) 保持一致。数据库会尝试把 expr2 转换成 expr1 的类型(如果类型不同),如果不能转换则报错。

questions.QuestionText: Which statement is true about aggregate functions?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Aggregate functions can be nested to any number of levels

Options.label: B
Options.text: The AVG function implicitly converts NULLS to zero

Options.label: C
Options.text: Aggregate functions can be used in any clause of a SELECT statement

Options.label: D
Options.text: Types MAX and MIN functions can be used on columns with character data

questions.Explanation: A.聚合函数不可以无限嵌套，单行函数可以嵌套无穷 B.AVG 计算平均值时，NULL 值会被忽略，并不是当作 0 参与计算。C.聚合函数不能在任意子句中使用，例如 WHERE 子句 中是不允许的（因为 WHERE 是在聚合前过滤数据），只能在 SELECT 列表、HAVING 子句 或 ORDER BY 中使用。D.max 和 min 可以用在数字、字符、和日期型的数据类型上

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true regarding the WHERE and HAVING clauses in a SELECT statement? (Choose two.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: The WHERE and HAVING clauses can be used in the same statement only if they are applied to different columns in the table.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The aggregate functions and columns used in the HAVING clause must be specified in the SELECT list of the query.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The WHERE clause can be used to exclude rows after dividing them into groups.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The HAVING clause can be used with aggregate functions in subqueries.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The WHERE clause can be used to exclude rows before dividing them into groups.

questions.Explanation: A.where 和 having 子句中用到的列没有相关联性 B.HAVING 可以使用未在 SELECT 中显示的聚合函数 C.WHERE 是在分组 前 执行的，不能用于分组后的数据。分组后筛选必须用 HAVING

questions.QuestionText: Your database instance was shut down normally and then started in NOMOUNT state. You then execute this command: ALTER DATABASE MOUNT; Which two actions are performed? (Choose two.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: The online redo logs are opened

Options.label: B
Options.text: The online data files are opened

Options.label: C
Options.text: The alert log records the execution details

Options.label: D
Options.text: The Oracle background processes are started

Options.label: E
Options.text: The initialization parameter file is read

Options.label: F
Options.text: The control file is read

questions.Explanation: 1.NOMOUNT:实例启动，但数据库还没有挂载。读取 初始化参数文件(SPFILE 或 PFILE)。启动Oracle后台进程(如 SMON、PMON、DBWR 等)。不读控制文件。不打开数据文件和重做日志。2.MOUNT:使用 ALTER DATABASE MOUNT 或 STARTUP MOUNT。读取 控制文件。可以进行数据库恢复和修改操作(例如修改表空间)。不打开数据文件。不打开在线重做日志(redo log)。3.OPEN:使用 ALTER DATABASE OPEN。数据库可以正常访问。打开数据文件和 redo log。

questions.QuestionText: Which two are true about shrinking a segment online? (Choose two.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: It is not possible to shrink either indexes or Index Organized Tables (IOTs)

Options.label: B
Options.text: It always eliminates all migrated rows if any exist in the table

Options.label: C
Options.text: To shrink a table it must have a PRIMARY KEY constraint

Options.label: D
Options.text: To shrink a table it must have a UNIQUE KEY constraint

Options.label: E
Options.text: To shrink a table it must have row movement enabled

Options.label: F
Options.text: It must be in a tablespace that uses Automatic Segment Space Management (ASSM)

questions.Explanation: 在 Oracle 中，ALTER TABLE ... SHRINK SPACE 可以用来释放表或索引占用的空间，同时整理表中的行，使它们尽量紧凑地存储。它可以 在线（online） 执行，也就是在收缩表的同时，应用仍然可以对表进行 DML 操作（INSERT、UPDATE、DELETE）Online shrink 只能在使用 ASSM 的表空间中执行，因为 ASSM 才能管理空闲空间并允许在线段收缩。必须启用行移动（row movement）。A.在线收缩 不能直接收缩 IOT（Index Organized Table），但普通表的索引是可以收缩的（ALTER INDEX ... SHRINK SPACE）。

questions.QuestionText: What must you do before executing it?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Ensure there are no pending transactions on the table.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Disable all indexes on the table.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Ensure free space that is approximately equal to the space used by the table should be available.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Enable row movement is enabled.

questions.Explanation: SHRINK SPACE 是 Oracle 用来回收表的空闲空间 的命令。COMPACT 表示 仅整理行，使行紧凑，不立即收回空间。COMPACT 只是重排行，把空闲空间集中到段的末尾，但不会立即减少段大小。如果想最终释放空间，需要执行 SHRINK SPACE（不带 COMPACT）或再执行 SHRINK SPACE 不带 COMPACT。

questions.QuestionText:
You want to reduce fragmentation and reclaim unused space for the sales table but not its dependent objects. During this operation, you want to ensure the following:
i. Long-running queries are not affected.
ii. No extra space is used.
iii. Data manipulation language (DML) operations on the table succeed at all times throughout the process
iv. Unused space is reclaimed both above and below the high water mark.
Which ALTER TABLE option would you recommend?

Options.label: A
Options.text: DEALLOCATE UNUSED

Options.label: B
Options.text: SHRINK SPACE CASCADE

Options.label: C
Options.text: SHRINK SPACE COMPACT

Options.label: D
Options.text: ROW STORE COMPRESS BASIC

questions.Explanation: (high water mark)HWM = 表空间使用的“最高标记”，不是实际数据量，而是已分配过的最高位置.A.只会释放表尾的未使用块。不能释放 HWM 以下的空间，也不能处理表中间的碎片 B.可以收回表和依赖的对象（索引）的空间。但题目要求不要影响 dependent objects，而 CASCADE 会同时移动索引等依赖对象。D.这是表压缩选项，主要用来减少存储占用，提高查询性能,不是专门用来回收碎片，也可能需要额外空间,SHRINK SPACE → 回收碎片、释放空间ROW STORE COMPRESS BASIC → 压缩数据，提高存储利用率

questions.QuestionText: Which four actions are possible during an Online Datafile Move operation?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Creating and dropping tables in the datafile being moved

Options.label: B
Options.text: Performing file shrink of the data file being moved

Options.label: C
Options.text: Querying tables in the datafile being moved

Options.label: D
Options.text: Performing Block Media Recovery for a data block in the datafile being moved

Options.label: E
Options.text: Flashing back the database

Options.label: F
Options.text: Executing DML statements on objects stored in the datafile being moved

questions.Explanation: Online Datafile Move可以在表空间在线（不需要关闭数据库）的情况下，把数据文件从一个位置移动到另一个位置或不同的磁盘卷上。表和索引在移动期间仍然可以访问。移动过程尽量不阻塞用户操作。移动是在线进行的，但有些操作是受限的。A.在线数据文件移动不会阻止对该文件中表的 DDL（创建、删除表等）操作 B.File shrink是收缩文件空间的操作，需要对文件本身做结构性调整。在线移动期间，数据文件正在被 Oracle 系统操作，无法同时执行收缩操作。D.Block Media Recovery (BMR) 是针对单个数据块的恢复操作。在线数据文件移动不影响 BMR，可以在需要的时候修复特定数据块。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the SQL*Loader (sqlldr) execution? (Choose two.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: It overwrites data in EMP with data in EMP.DAT

Options.label: B
Options.text: It uses the database buffer cache to load data

Options.label: C
Options.text: It generates a log that contains control file entries, which can be used with normal SQL*Loader operations

Options.label: D
Options.text: It generates a SQL script that it uses to load data from EMP.DAT to EMP

Options.label: E
Options.text: It appends data from EMP.DAT to EMP

questions.Explanation: SQL*Loader(sqlldr) 可以有三种模式来加载数据：1.INSERT（默认模式）插入数据到表中。如果表已经存在主键冲突，会报错。2.APPEND在现有数据基础上追加数据。3.REPLACE删除表中原有数据，然后加载新数据。如果没有在命令中指定 APPEND 或 REPLACE，默认模式是 INSERT。B.SQL*Loader 默认使用 直接路径（direct path）或常规路径（conventional path）。直接路径加载会绕过数据库缓冲区。常规路径加载会使用 SQL 插入操作，但不等同于直接操作缓存。

questions.QuestionText:
A script abc.sql must be executed to perform a job. A database user HR, who is defined in this database, executes this command:
$ sqlplus hr/hr@orcl @abc.sql
What will happen upon execution?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The command succeeds and HR will be connected to the orcl and abc.sql databases

Options.label: B
Options.text: The command succeeds and HR will be connected to the orcl database instance, and the abc.sql script will be executed

Options.label: C
Options.text: The command fails because the script must refer to the full path name

Options.label: D
Options.text: The command fails and reports an error because @ is used twice

questions.Explanation: 命令行提示符 $（普通用户）或 #（root 用户）来表示可以输入命令。sqlplus 是启动 Oracle SQL*Plus 客户端的命令。hr/hr@orcl表示:用户名hr,密码hr,数据库实例orcl（TNS alias，表示要连接的数据库）,所以执行这个命令后，SQL*Plus会尝试连接到orcl数据库，使用 HR 用户。@abc.sql在 SQL*Plus 中，@filename 用于执行SQL脚本文件,这里的 abc.sql 可以是：当前目录下的文件或者指定完整路径（如 /home/oracle/abc.sql）。SQL*Plus会读取这个文件，并执行里面的SQL命令。

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true regarding indexes? (Choose three.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: A UNIQUE index can be altered to be non-unique

Options.label: B
Options.text: A SELECT statement can access one or more indexes without accessing any tables

Options.label: C
Options.text: A table belonging to one user can have an index that belongs to a different user

Options.label: D
Options.text: An update to a table can result in updates to any or all of the table’s indexes

Options.label: E
Options.text: When a table is dropped and is moved to the RECYCLE BIN, all indexes built on that table are permanently dropped

Options.label: F
Options.text: An update to a table can result in no updates to any of the table’s indexes

questions.Explanation: 索引在数据库中主要作用是提高查询效率，并在某些情况下维护数据完整性（如 UNIQUE 或 PRIMARY KEY）。A.UNIQUE 索引本身不能直接改成非唯一索引。你需要先删除索引，然后重新创建为非唯一索引。B.如果查询中需要的列 不在索引里，数据库仍然需要回表。并不是所有索引都是覆盖索引，只有当索引包含查询所需的所有列时才是。E.当表被放入 RECYCLE BIN 时，表和它的索引都暂时保留在回收站中，可以用 FLASHBACK TABLE 恢复。DF.对表的更新可能导致对表的任何或所有索引的更新,例如:更新表的列是索引的列,也可能不会导致对表索引的任何更新,例如:更新表的列不是索引的列

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about Oracle synonyms? (Choose three.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: A synonym cannot be created for a PL/SQL package

Options.label: B
Options.text: A synonym can be available to all users

Options.label: C
Options.text: A SEQUENCE can have a synonym

Options.label: D
Options.text: A synonym created by one user can refer to an object belonging to another user

Options.label: E
Options.text: Any user can drop a PUBLIC synonym

questions.Explanation: Synonym相当于是一个别名，用来引用数据库中的其他对象（表、视图、序列、存储过程、函数、包等）。简化了对象访问（不用写完整的schema.object）。屏蔽对象实际所属 schema 或位置。Private synonym（私有同义词）：只能由创建它的用户访问。Public synonym（公共同义词）：所有用户都可以访问。只有属主和有drop public synonym权限的用户才能够删除public同义词。C.SEQUENCE（序列）是一个独立的数据库对象，用来生成唯一的、按顺序递增或递减的数字

questions.QuestionText: Which two tasks can be performed on an external table?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Partitioning the table

Options.label: B
Options.text: Creating an invisible index

Options.label: C
Options.text: Updating the table by using an UPDATE statement

Options.label: D
Options.text: Creating a public synonym

Options.label: E
Options.text: Creating a view

questions.Explanation: 外部表（External Table）是 Oracle 提供的一种功能，让你可以 像查询普通表一样访问数据库外部的文件（比如 CSV、文本文件等）。数据存储在数据库外部，Oracle 只是“读取”它。可以用 SELECT 查询数据。不能进行 DML 操作（INSERT、UPDATE、DELETE），因为数据不在数据库里。E.视图 = 一张“查询结果表”，用来看数据，但不存数据本身

questions.QuestionText: Which is true?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It performs the export successfully.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It throws an error as the table test_employees is empty and CONTENT=data_only is specified.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It throws an error as the QUERY parameter is not supported on an empty table.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It throws an error as Data Pump cannot find a table called TEST.EMP.

questions.Explanation: Oracle Data Pump 是 Oracle 提供的一种高速数据导入/导出工具，用来在数据库之间迁移数据或备份表、模式、表空间等。它的命令行工具有两个：expdp → Export Data Pump：导出数据（生成 .dmp 文件）。impdp → Import Data Pump：导入数据（从 .dmp 文件恢复数据）。比传统 exp/imp 快，支持并行导出/导入，支持导出表、视图、模式、表空间。支持通过 查询过滤导出部分数据。可以导出到服务器上指定的目录，而不是客户端。本题:创建了DIRECTORY dumpdir一个物理目录，给了所有用户读写public权限，创建了一个新用户TEST密码是test，TEST创建了一个test_employees表格，为 test_employees 表创建了一个 同义词 emp。最后指令TABLES=emp 指定了要导出的对象是emp。但emp是同义词，不是表，Data Pump 不直接支持导出同义词，它只能导出 表、视图、模式等真实对象。即使emp指向test_employees，Data Pump仍然会报错：“找不到表 TEST.EMP”。

Options.label: A
Options.text: All data along with the table structure is deleted.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A pending transaction in the session is committed.

Options.label: C
Options.text: All indexes on the table remain but they are invalidated.

Options.label: D
Options.text: All views and synonyms on the table remain but they are invalidated.

Options.label: E
Options.text: All data in the table is deleted but the table structure remains.

questions.Explanation: B.Oracle 中 DDL 自动提交，Oracle在执行DROP TABLE前，会隐式提交当前会话里的所有未提交事务。

questions.QuestionText: Which two tasks require subqueries? (Choose two.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: Display the number of products whose PROD_LIST_PRICE is more than the average PROD_LIST_PRICE

Options.label: B
Options.text: Display suppliers whose PROD_LIST_PRICE is less than 1000

Options.label: C
Options.text: Display products whose PROD_MIN_PRICE is more than the average PROD_LIST_PRICE of all products, and whose status is orderable

Options.label: D
Options.text: Display the total number of products supplied by supplier 102 which have a product status of obsolete

Options.label: E
Options.text: Display the minimum PROD_LIST_PRICE for each product status

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements must be true so that the SALES user can create tables in SALES_Q1? (Choose three.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: The sales user must have a quota on the TEMP tablespace

Options.label: B
Options.text: The sales user must have a quota on the SALES_Q1 tablespace to hold the initial extends of all tables they plan to create in their schema

Options.label: C
Options.text: The sales user must have been granted the CREATE SESSION privilege

Options.label: D
Options.text: The sales user must have their quota on the users tablespace removed

Options.label: E
Options.text: The sales user must have a quota on the SALES_Q1 tablespace to hold all the rows to be inserted into any table in their schema

Options.label: F
Options.text: The sales user must have been granted the CREATE TABLE privilege

questions.Explanation: 命令解析:先创建了个用户和密码，但是没给权限。用户创建后，如果没有其他权限，他还不能登录数据库，因为缺少登录权限（CREATE SESSION）。DEFAULT TABLESPACE sales_q1指定该用户的默认表空间为 sales_q1。这意味着：当该用户创建表或索引时，如果不指定 TABLESPACE 子句，这些对象会默认保存在 sales_q1 表空间中。但是要在这个表空间中存储数据，还必须有配额 (quota)。TEMPORARY TABLESPACE temp指定该用户使用的临时表空间。临时表空间用于排序、哈希连接、创建索引等操作的临时数据。普通用户不需要配额使用临时表空间（临时空间不算 quota 限制）。QUOTA 5M ON users;给sales用户在users表空间上分配5MB的使用额度。A.临时表空间不需要配额。它只是用来放排序或中间结果，Oracle自动管理。

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about table data storage in an Oracle Database? (Choose three.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: Data block headers contain their own Data Block Address (DBA)

Options.label: B
Options.text: A table row piece can be chained across several database blocks

Options.label: C
Options.text: Multiple row pieces from the same row may be stored in different database blocks

Options.label: D
Options.text: Multiple row pieces from the same row may be stored in the same block

Options.label: E
Options.text: Data block free space is always contiguous in the middle of the block

Options.label: F
Options.text: Index block free space is always contiguous in the middle of the block

questions.Explanation: A.每个数据块（Data Block）是最小的存储单位。每个数据块由三个主要部分组成：1.Block Header（块头）2.Table Directory / Row Directory（表和行目录）3.Free space + Row data（空闲区和行数据）块头 (Header) 存放元信息，例如：该块的类型（数据块、索引块等）,块所属的段（segment）信息,事务信息（事务槽）,DBA（Data Block Address） — 数据块的物理地址（数据文件号 + 块号）B.一个“行（row）”的数据可能太大，无法完全放进一个数据块,Oracle会将该行拆成多个row piece（行片段）。如果这些行片段分布在不同的数据块中，就叫做 chained row（行链式存储）。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true? (Choose two.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: The second ROLLBACK command does nothing

Options.label: B
Options.text: The second ROLLBACK command replays the delete

Options.label: C
Options.text: The first ROLLBACK command restores the 101 rows that were deleted, leaving the inserted row still to be committed

Options.label: D
Options.text: The second ROLLBACK command undoes the insert

Options.label: E
Options.text: The first ROLLBACK command restores the 101 rows that were deleted and commits the inserted row

questions.Explanation: 1.初始状态(已提交)100行 → 2.INSERT 101行(未提交) → 3.SAVEPOINT a 101行 → 4.DELETE 0行 → 5.ROLLBACK TO a 101行 → 6.ROLLBACK 100行,最后一个rollback指整个事务回滚
